package ProgramsPractise;

import java.util.Arrays;

public class ArrayRevSaving {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a[]=new int[4];
		a[0]=10;
		a[1]=15;
		a[2]=20;
		a[3]=25;
		int l=a.length;
		int[] b=new int[a.length];
				//Arrays.copyOf(a, b);
		
		System.out.println(b.length);
		
	
	}

}
